title: Dos and Don'ts of Essential Oils
author: Paul Frysh
description: Essential oils like lavender and mint are popular as alternative therapies to inhale or to rub into the skin. Find out the DOs and DON'Ts of essential oils and aromatherapy from this WebMD slideshow.
cleaned_text: Dos and Don'ts of Essential Oils What Are Essential Oils? 1/17 DO Try It if You're Anxious 2/17 DON'T Just Rub Them Anywhere 3/17 DO Check the Quality 4/17 DON'T Trust Buzzwords 5/17 DO Toss Out Older Oils 6/17 DON'T Put Edible Oils On Your Skin 7/17 DO Tell Your Doctor 8/17 DO Dilute Them 9/17 DON'T Use On Damaged Skin 10/17 DO Consider Age 11/17 DON'T Forget to Store Them Safely 12/17 DO Stop Use if Your Skin Reacts 13/17 DO Choose Your Therapist Carefully 14/17 DON'T Overdo It 15/17 DON'T Be Afraid to Try Them 16/17 DO Take
